tool_description: Question answering API with all background information for the answer given by the user.
name: Walnut Chatbot
title: Walnut Chatbot

api_list.name: wrt_transformer
api_list.description: Send the question and background information. The API will return the answer based on the background information.

required_parameters.name: question
required_parameters.default: How much is the vip service?

required_parameters.name: information
required_parameters.default: The basic service costs $10, the vip service costs $40. To signup, click the blue button. We are open from Monday to Saturday.
